screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .aia file in MIT App Inventor
screenshot.caption: AIA file open in MIT App Inventor

description: App Inventor allows you to drag and drop elements, such as buttons, images, text boxes, and sliders, to create a mobile application and program its functionality. When you save an App Inventor project, it is typically saved to your online account. However, you can also download App Inventor projects as AIA files. To download a project as an AIA file, select Projects and choose Export selected project (.aia) to my computer .
NOTE: You can also use Kodular Creator, an App Inventor variant, to open AIA files.
